tier_1_determinative.sexual_act_description: The appellant did nothing by force. The victim stated that no force or violence was used by the appellant.
tier_1_determinative.absence_of_consent: The victim voluntarily went with the appellant; no absence of consent as per her statement.

tier_2_material.relationship_to_accused: The appellant enticed the minor girl of the informant.

tier_3_contextual.incident_location: Travelled from Lucknow to Assam and stayed at the appellant's grandfather's house.

tier_4_procedural.respondent: State Of U.P. Thru. Prin. Secy. Home Lko. And 2 Others
